docs.lead_paragraph: Russia’s Investigative Committee on Monday acknowledged for the first time that 37-year-old Sergei L. Magnitsky died in pretrial detention because authorities denied him medical care.

docs.lead_paragraph: The issue has become whether Germany is able to show an ability to lead, not to mention willingness to bear the responsibility and pain of facing up to the problems that challenge Europe's relevance.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: An increase in the number of measles outbreaks in Europe, Asia and Africa in recent months is cause for concern at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in the United States. Candice Burns Hoffmann, a press officer for the center, said in a release that the United States was experiencing “the highest number of measles cases since 1996,” in large part because of unvaccinated travelers recently returned from overseas.
docs.abstract: Travelers are encouraged to get MMR (measles, mumps and rubella) vaccines before going overseas because of increases in measles outbreaks in Europe, Asia and Africa.
docs.snippet: Travelers are encouraged to get MMR (measles, mumps and rubella) vaccines before going overseas because of increases in measles outbreaks in Europe, Asia and Africa.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel has been criticized after news of a deal for the secret sale of 200 tanks to Saudi Arabia.
